# representedElementCategory

**Instance Property**

The type of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var representedElementCategory: UICollectionView.ElementCategory { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use the value in this property to distinguish whether the layout attributes are intended for a cell, supplementary view, or decoration view.

## Identifying the referenced item

- **indexPath**: The index path of the item in the collection view.
- **representedElementKind**: The layout-specific identifier for the target view.
- **UICollectionView.ElementCategory**: Constants specifying the type of view.
